fa2png.io

Font-Awesome to PNG online converter

  • Overview

fa2png is a Font-Awesome-To-PNG-Online-Converter. Nothing more to say =)

Well.. maybe a little bit.

A friend of mine came up with the idea of this online-icon-font-to-image-generation-tool.

There are services like flaticon.com but he wanted something else:

  • easy simple setup
  • possibility to choose different sizes
  • possibility to choose different colors
  • plain font-awesome

So after a 12 hour hackathon we came up with fa2png.io

Yea! That's it. Hope you like it.

– david-dahan.com –
